object:
Main Object class from which all Gideros classes inherit.
There is no other purpose for this classes, rather a neat way to add methods to all Gideros classes android ios mac pc html5 winrt win32 Returns the class name of the instance as string class name as string Returns the class name which object directly inherits from returns base class name Returns true if instance is of provided class name or if it inherits from provided class name The name of the class to check relation to true if instance belongs or inherits from class, false otherwise local bmp = Bitmap.new("image.png") print(bmp:getClass()) -- prints Bitmap print(bmp:getBaseClass()) -- prints Sprite print(bmp:isInstanceOf("Bitmap")) -- prints true print(bmp:isInstanceOf("Sprite")) -- prints true print(bmp:isInstanceOf("EventDispatcher")) -- prints true print(bmp:isInstanceOf("Object")) -- prints true print(bmp:isInstanceOf("TileMap")) -- prints false
